name: Metanoia
description: Metanoia is a 3D first person adventure where you control an unidentified person within their mind. This game features a small open world style hub, a tropical island, that leads to several different levels each depicting a mental illness. Experience each world as they take on different genres, ranging from being a platformer to a mini-game collection. There are secrets to discover, beautiful stylistic views to capture and a whole realm of varied and unique themes to experience.
